name: MockingJay Hunger Games Print Messenger Bag - Field Style for School, College, Travel, Vacation, Boo
description:
This is an essential, roomy, and sturdy khaki green "field style" messenger bag for adventure, travel, school and vacation that features a silhouette of a mockingjay, cut from a page of text from the Hunger Games book -- the first one in the trilogy. This is the page where Katness volunteers to be a tribute, to replace her dear sister, Prim. If you zoom in, you can read the text.

A scan of the page and the mockingjay were individually manipulated and merged with photo-editing software, using a multi-step masking and reverse process to make the silhouette. The resulting image was printed on special transfer paper and heat sealed to the bag.

~~~
Want this on a different color bag? You can be the boss of me: 
http://www.etsy.com/listing/81198475/printed-canvas-laptopbook-bag-custom
~~~

This messenger bag is nice and sturdy. All of the seams are double stitched. The straps are comfortable cotton webbing. It has a large main compartment, interior zipped pocket, and a full-width front flap that is secured with two brass toggles. I can fit my laptop, notebook and 1200 page text book all inside.

Other Details ~
Length : 16"
Width : 12"
Depth : 3.5"
Strap : 2" wide adjustable from 20" to 36"

The bag is 100% cotton heavy enzyme-washed canvas and completely washable, but the print needs special care. Wash inside out and in cold water. Don't use chlorine bleach and don't soak. Don't iron. Tumble dry on low heat and remove from dryer promptly

This pack will be shipped in a padded envelope to reduce packing waste and minimize your postage. You can press out any wrinkles with an iron on medium-high.

name: Jane Austen Romance Print Messenger Bag - Field Style for School, College, Travel, Vacation, Book, L
description:
This is an essential, roomy, and sturdy blue "field style" messenger bag for adventure, travel, school and vacation that features a silhouette of a Jane Austen, cut from a page of her seminal romantic novel, "Pride and Prejudice". In this passage, Elizabeth responds to Mr Darcy with the reasons for her rejection of his affections:

"I might as well inquire," replied she, "why, with so evident a design of offending and insulting me, you chose to tell me that you liked me against your will, against your reason, and even against your character?"

Don't worry. I didn't really cut-up my copy of 'Pride and Prejudice'. The relevant page was scanned and edited with software, using a multi-step masking and reverse process. The slight yellowing of the paper comes honestly from the age of my original book, printed in 1980. The resulting image was printed on special transfer paper and heat sealed to the bag.

~~~
Want this on a different color bag? You can be the boss of me: 
http://www.etsy.com/listing/81198475/printed-canvas-laptopbook-bag-custom
~~~

This messenger bag is nice and sturdy. All of the seams are double stitched. The straps are comfortable cotton webbing. It has a large main compartment, interior zipped pocket, and a full-width front flap that is secured with two brass toggles. I can fit my laptop, notebook and 1200 page text book all inside.

Other Details ~
Length : 16"
Width : 12"
Depth : 3.5"
Strap : 2" wide adjustable from 20" to 36"

The bag is 100% cotton heavy enzyme-washed canvas and completely washable, but the print needs special care. Wash inside out and in cold water. Don't use chlorine bleach and don't soak. Don't iron. Tumble dry on low heat and remove from dryer promptly

This pack will be shipped in a padded envelope to reduce packing waste and minimize your postage. You can press out any wrinkles with an iron on medium-high.


Want this on a different color bag? You can be the boss of me: http://www.etsy.com/listing/81198181/printed-canvas-messenger-bag-custom 

Would you like to see this on a tee or hoodie? Visit my clothing shop: http://skreened.com/bagchemistry

name: Classic Sherlock Holmes Print Messenger Bag - Field Style for School, College, Travel, Vacation, Boo
description:
This is an essential, roomy, and sturdy khaki green "field style" messenger bag for adventure, travel, school and vacation that features a silhouette of Sherlock Holmes cut from a page in his most infamous story, "A Scandal in Bohemia". You probably know that this is the story which introduced "the woman", Irene Adler. But it was also the first of Arthur Conan Doyle's 56 Sherlock Holmes short stories to be published in The Strand Magazine.

Don't worry. I didn't really cut-up my copy of Sherlock Holmes. The relevant page was scanned and edited with software, using a multi-step masking and reverse process. The slight yellowing of the paper comes honestly from the age of my original book, printed in 1978. The resulting image was printed on special transfer paper and heat sealed to the bag.

~~~
Want this on a different color bag? You can be the boss of me: 
http://www.etsy.com/listing/81198475/printed-canvas-laptopbook-bag-custom
~~~

This messenger bag is nice and sturdy. All of the seams are double stitched. The straps are comfortable cotton webbing. It has a large main compartment, interior zipped pocket, and a full-width front flap that is secured with two brass toggles. I can fit my laptop, notebook and 1200 page text book all inside.

Other Details ~
Length : 16"
Width : 12"
Depth : 3.5"
Strap : 2" wide adjustable from 20" to 36"

The bag is 100% cotton heavy enzyme-washed canvas and completely washable, but the print needs special care. Wash inside out and in cold water. Don't use chlorine bleach and don't soak. Don't iron. Tumble dry on low heat and remove from dryer promptly

This pack will be shipped in a padded envelope to reduce packing waste and minimize your postage. You can press out any wrinkles with an iron on medium-high.

name: BBC Sherlock Print Messenger Bag - Field Style for School, College, Travel, Vacation, Book, Laptop
description:
This is an essential, roomy, and sturdy blue "field style" messenger bag for adventure, travel, school and vacation that features a silhouette of the BBC Sherlock Holmes, cut from a page in the original Holmes' infamous story, "A Scandal in Bohemia". You probably know that this is the story which introduced "the woman", Irene Adler. But it was also the first of Arthur Conan Doyle's 56 Sherlock Holmes short stories to be published in The Strand Magazine.

Now I didn't really cut-up my copy of Sherlock Holmes. The relevant page was scanned and edited with software, using a multi-step masking and reverse process. The slight yellowing of the paper comes honestly from the age of my original book, printed in 1978. The resulting image was printed on special transfer paper and heat sealed to the bag.

The silhouette is based on fan art of Benedict Cumberbatch (Mr. Holmes) by the very talented Lydia Butz, used here with her permission. You can see more of her artwork here: http://girl-on-the-moon.deviantart.com/

~~~
Don't want to wait? Want this on a different color bag? You can be the boss of me: 
http://www.etsy.com/listing/81198475/printed-canvas-laptopbook-bag-custom
~~~

This messenger bag is nice and sturdy. All of the seams are double stitched. The straps are comfortable cotton webbing. It has a large main compartment, interior zipped pocket, and a full-width front flap that is secured with two brass toggles. I can fit my laptop, notebook and 1200 page text book all inside.

Other Details ~
Length : 16"
Width : 12"
Depth : 3.5"
Strap : 2" wide adjustable from 20" to 36"

The bag is 100% cotton heavy enzyme-washed canvas and completely washable, but the print needs special care. Wash inside out and in cold water. Don't use chlorine bleach and don't soak. Don't iron. Tumble dry on low heat and remove from dryer promptly

This pack will be shipped in a padded envelope to reduce packing waste and minimize your postage. You can press out any wrinkles with an iron on medium-high.

name: Custom Bag - Printed Canvas Field Style Messenger Bag - for School, College, Travel, Vacation, Book,
description:
You're the boss of me. Custom design your own essential roomy and sturdy bag for adventure, travel, school and vacation. I'll make you whatever you want, starting as soon as I get your spec.

1) You are building a field style messenger bag. It is 100% cotton heavy enzyme-washed canvas and completely washable. 

Field Style is taller than it is wide. The straps are comfortable cotton webbing. It has a large main compartment, interior zipped pocket, and a full-width front flap that is secured with two brass toggles. I can fit my laptop, notebook and 1200 page text book all inside.

Other Details ~
Height: 16" (taller than it is wide)
Width : 12"
Depth : 3.5"
Strap : 2" wide adjustable from 20" to 36"

2) Pick a Bag Color. Pick indigo blue, cocoa brown, natural tan, khaki green, or stone gray.

3) Pick a Print Design. I have lots: bugs, sharks, birds, skeletons, organs, comics, robots and vintage photography. New designs like Jane Austen, Sherlock Holmes and Einstein are available now. Power Woman and Good Robot can be customized with your choice of colors and captions, too.

Or, do you have an idea for something that I've never done? I have a lot of fun with those. Convo me first, and see if I can sketch something up for you. (http://www.etsy.com/conversations/new?with_id=5957116)

Paste the text below into your buyer note when you check out, and I'll send you a note back to let you know how soon I can start on your order, and when it will be shipped. There might be a slight delay if I don't have everything I need in stock.

Be sure to delete the undesired options. 

----------- COPY-AND-PASTE ------------

Build my Bag!
1) Type: Field style messenger bag
2) Bag color: Blue, Brown, Natural, Poppy, Khaki Green, Gray
3) Design: Jane Austen, BBC Sherlock, Classic Sherlock, MockingJay
